detail_desc: Cardigan in a soft knit containing some wool with a shawl collar, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and side pockets.
T-shirt in soft viscose jersey with a slight sheen. Print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline.

Single-breasted jacket in a textured weave with notch lapels and buttoning at the front. Fake pocket with a decorative handkerchief at the top and fake flap pockets at the front. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Straight T-shirt in soft, airy viscose slub jersey with a deep V-neck.
Long-sleeved top in jersey made from a cotton blend with a print motif.

Set with a vest top and matching shorts. Vest top in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and a ribbed trim around the neckline and armholes. Knee-length shorts in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a ribbed, elasticated, drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams and a print motif on one leg.
Washed cotton twill trousers in a regular fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and front and back pockets.
Briefs in soft, stretch silk and lace with a mid waist and high cut at the back.
Teddy jacket in soft faux shearling with a zip down the front, concealed pockets in the side seams and covered elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined in woven fabric made from recycled polyester.
Fabric cap with an appliqué on the front and an adjustable tab at the back.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.

Short, padded jacket in woven fabric with a stand-up collar that is ribbed on the inside and a zip down the front. Zipped side pockets, an inner pocket with a press-stud, adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a ribbed hem. Polyester filling. Lined.

Short sleeveless dress in soft slub jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a V-neck front and back and sewn-in wrapover front. Seam at the waist with a gently flared skirt and sewn-in ties. Unlined.
Short, flared skirt in a stretch knit with a high waist with concealed elastication, and a pointelle section and scalloped trim at the hem. Unlined.
Pull-on trousers in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Tapered legs with seams at the knees and elasticated hems.
Shorts in washed, stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Romper suit in soft, fine-knit cotton with long raglan sleeves with buttons on one shoulder and long legs with buttons from the crotch to the hems.
Knee-length dress in woven fabric with a mandarin collar, V-neck and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with rounded, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Unlined.
T-shirt in printed jersey with a chest pocket and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Straight-cut top in sequined mesh with a round neckline, opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck and 3/4-length sleeves. Jersey lining.
Short-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a ventilating mesh yoke and back.
Trousers in soft viscose jersey with a regular, elasticated waist, side pockets and tapered legs.
Shorts in stretch, matt silk cotton twill with a zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Cardigan knitted in soft cotton with long sleeves and buttons down the front.

prod_name: This is Sally Push Up Bra
detail_desc: Fully lined bikini top with a lace detail at the top and underwired, moulded, padded cups that lift and shape. Ties at the back of the neck.
Earrings with a round, textured metal disc at the top and a tear-shaped resin pendant. Length 8 cm.
Treggings in crushed velvet with a sheen. Elasticated waist.

Straight-cut, single-breasted jacket in a soft weave with notch lapels, two buttons at the front, a chest pocket and two flap front pockets. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.

Imitation leather boots with a padded top edge, adjustable hook and loop tab, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Decorative welt seam around the soles, mesh linings and insoles and chunky TPR (thermoplastic rubber) soles.
Short, smocked, off-the-shoulder top in cotton jersey with short sleeves and overlocked edges.
Oval metal earrings. Size 4x3.5 cm.
Leggings in soft, ribbed cotton jersey with elastication and a decorative bow at the waist.
Wide, rib-knit cardigan in wool containing some cashmere with a V-neck and buttons down the front. Long raglan sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and slits in the sides of the hem.
Long-sleeved dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with a round neckline and a seam with a wide flounce a the hem.

Set with a sweatshirt and pair of joggers in soft fabric. Block-coloured top with a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Joggers with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist, side pockets and legs with contrasting colour stripes down the sides and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Pyjamas in supersoft jersey. Top with a V-neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and rounded hem. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and tapered legs.

Shirt in soft, washed cotton denim with a collar, press-studs down the front and a chest pocket. Relaxed fit with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Embroidered patches that can be ironed onto garments. Sizes from 9x12.5 cm to 3x24.5 cm.
Off-the-shoulder top in a soft rib-knit with a V-neck, narrow shoulder straps and long sleeves with concealed silicone trim at the top.

Padded ski jacket in wind- and water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with a detachable, lined hood with an elasticated edge and adjustable hook and loop tab at the back. Waterproof zip down the front, zipped side pockets and a zipped sleeve pocket. Hook and loop tab and inner ribbing with thumbholes at the cuffs, a snow flap with press-studs and reinforced elastication at the waist, and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Reflective details. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey with a yoke and sleeves in mesh and gathers in the sides for optimum fit.
T-shirt in jersey made from a cotton blend with an interactive motif.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets, an open back pocket and raw, roll-edge hems.

Sleeveless playsuit in lace with a double-layered top and a cut-out and wrapover at the back with concealed press-studs at the back of the neck. Seam at the waist with a concealed zip at the back, and scalloped edges at the top and hems. Lined.
Pyjamas with a top and shorts in soft cotton seersucker. Top with flutter sleeves and a wide, elasticated neckline with a decorative bow. Shorts with an elasticated waist.

Outdoor trousers in slightly stretchy, functional fabric with a zip fly and press-stud and a hook and loop fastening. Side pockets, a zipped leg pocket, and tapered legs with seams at the knees for optimum comfort and mobility, and reinforced hems.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Set with a bodysuit and pair of leggings in printed organic cotton jersey. Long-sleeved bodysuit with press-studs at the crotch. Leggings with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist.

Super push-up bra in microfibre and lace with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Body in cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and press-studs at the crotch.
Long-sleeved blouse in dobby-weave cotton with frill details, a small stand-up collar, V-neck and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with smocking and a narrow frill trim at the cuffs. Unlined.

Swim shorts in woven fabric made from recycled polyester with an elasticated, drawstring waist. Discreet side pockets and a flap back pocket with a hook and loop fastening and small metal eyelet. Short slits in the sides of the hems. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Short, sleeveless dress in sturdy jersey with a deep neckline at the back, seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Cap in cotton twill with a glittery print on the front and ties at the back.
Small bag in grained imitation leather with a shoulder strap and zip at the top. Lined. Size 17x25 cm.
Alice band covered in glossy jersey with a decorative knot detail at the top.
Short dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and smocked back. Seam at the waist and a gently bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Patterned swimsuit with a frill at the top and narrow shoulder straps with decorative bows. Lined at the front.
Sandals in imitation suede with straps over the foot and ribbed elastic around the heel. Imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered block heels, 6.5 cm.
Jersey vest top with a motif, chiffon top layer and wrapover back.
Warm-lined boots in suede with a concealed zip at the back. Faux fur linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Wide, calf-length skirt in silk with a high waist and concealed elastication at the sides.
Short, boxy-style jacket in washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Flap chest pockets with a button and side pockets.
Jumper in a jacquard knit with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shaping briefs in microfibre with a high lace-trimmed waist, laser-cut edges and a lined gusset. The briefs have a lightly sculpting effect on the tummy, seat and hips.
Imitation leather flip-flops with a decorative knot at the front. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles.
Cargo shorts in cotton poplin with a zip fly and button. Side pockets, flap back pockets with a concealed press-stud and flap leg pockets with a pleat and concealed press-studs.

Top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The polyester content of the sweatshirt is recycled.
Fancy dress costume in soft velour with a sheen. Hood with embroidered details, appliqués and faux fur sections, a zip down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.

Shaping briefs in microfibre with a light shaping effect on the waist. High waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back. Laser-cut edges around the legs for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin and minimal visibility under clothes.
Cardigan in a textured cotton knit with a V-neck, buttons down the front and fake front pockets, Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shopper in grained imitation leather with imitation suede inside and two handles at the top. Unlined. Size 16x28x38 cm.
Top in a semi-transparent weave with decorative fringing, V-neck and skinny shoulder straps. Lined at the top.
Short dress in soft viscose jersey with a V-neck and short sleeves.
Flared leggings in jersey. High waist with covered elastication, and a slit at the hems.
Leather belt with a metal buckle. Width 3.5 cm.
Wide, fabric-covered Alice band with a knot detail on the top.
Sleeveless, turtleneck body in stretch, ribbed jersey with press-studs at the crotch.
